translations: n.圆顶小帽（犹太男子在祷告，学习，吃饭等时戴的，等于 yarmelke）

sentences.sentence: Jews were called "the Muslims with the blue caps, " referring to the color of the yarmulkes some still wore.
sentences.translation: 由于有的开封犹太人仍戴着犹太男子所特有的蓝色圆顶小帽，因此他们被称为“蓝帽回回”。

sentences.sentence: Four orthodox jewish students color with crayons at school. They wear yarmulkes on their heads and their hair in traditional earlocks.
sentences.translation: 四个正统犹太教的孩子正在学校用彩笔绘画。在他们的头上戴着传统服饰圆顶小帽。
